name: Ready to Die (Bryce Bucher, AydenJM)
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Use a die and your brain to touch a green thing. Do it multiple times.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This game was created by Bryce Bucher and Ayden Machajewski for the GMTK 2022 48 hour jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice". It is a logic puzzle game in which you must navigate a die to the end goal. Each number on the die represents a different ability the player must use to solve each puzzle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Controls:

Move Forward: W, Up Arrow

Move Backwards: S, Down Arrow

Turn Left: A, Left Arrow

Turn Right: D, Right

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Features:

- An Entire Six Sided Die

-22 Levels

-5 Special Abilities

-00s Shareware Vibes

-The Thing Saves Your Progress (wow!)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Credits:

Bryce Bucher: Design, Programming, Animation, Asset Creation, Graphic Design

Ayden Machajewski: Most of the Level Design, Programming, FMOD Integration, Music, Sound Design

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

(Check us out on Twitter: @BryceBucher, @ajmachajewski)
